title: Biomass screening for syngas production by flash photopyrolysis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,11706-11714
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01845A, Paper

Abderrahman Mellalou, Wanderson O. Silva, Mathieu Soutrenon, Hubert H. Girault, Abdelkader Outzourhit, Jones Alami, Fouad Ghamouss
A few seconds flash photopyrolysis is used as efficient screening tool for the investigation of selected biomass in producing syngas, hydrogen and biochar.
